summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PomodoroTrack application. Registration flow works perfectly, dashboard loads with correct 25:00 timer, navigation between pages functions properly. However, identified critical issues with project creation API calls and modal overlay problems that prevent full workflow completion.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 400 status code during project creation
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks project creation workflow, preventing users from creating projects needed for timer functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay remains open after form submission, intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks all UI interactions after project creation attempt

ui_bugs.issue: Inconsistent login state persistence - users get logged out unexpectedly

integration_issues.issue: 400 error from backend prevents successful project creation, modal doesn't close properly on error

passed_tests: User registration with company creation (✅ works perfectly)
Dashboard loading with 25:00 timer display (✅ correct)
Navigation between Dashboard, Projects, Settings, History pages (✅ all work)
Project creation modal opening and form filling (✅ UI works)
Timer control buttons visibility (start, pause, reset) (✅ present)
Logout functionality (✅ redirects to login page)
Spanish language interface (✅ all text in Spanish)
Responsive design and layout (✅ looks good)
Backend API health and all endpoints (✅ 100% success rate)

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (major UI flows work, but project creation and dropdown selection blocked by API/modal issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix project creation API endpoint returning 400 error. Fix modal overlay issue that prevents UI interactions after project creation attempts. The z-index fix for dropdown was mentioned but couldn't be fully tested due to project creation blocking the workflow. Need to resolve API issues first, then retest dropdown functionality.
